column5: HI I am looking for a good trolling motor battery from canadian tire. can you recomend a good battery.

I bought this one....it's a Nautilus Deep Cycle  http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...D=1191288358707  Also bought a Nautilus dual charger as well.  I use it for a 30 pound thrust trolling motor....used it for 5 hours one time on settings varying from 3 to 5 (5 is the max) and still had 50% charge left at the end of the day.

whatever you do make sure they test it first!  I walked out of there with a battery that was dead and wouldn't hold a charge.  Man did that ever confuse me when I hooked it up in the boat, couldn't figure out what I had done wrong.  Took me a good half hour before I considered the battery was the problem!
I also have a nautilus deep cycle and charger,  Three years now and not one problem.
Beware the dusty battery, some of them are sitting on the shelf for years, they get monthy charge ups but its better to get a fresh one! Buy one somewhere that sells alot and you will be happier...
Yes try to get a fresh one, but the Nautilus big deep cycles are good.
